source.2b02bbef:
text = str(ff['name'])
wordcloud = WordCloud().generate(text)
wordcloud = WordCloud(max_font_size=100, max_words=100, background_color="white").generate(text)
plt.figure()
plt.imshow(wordcloud, interpolation="bilinear")
plt.axis("off")
plt.show()
source.777a9496:
text = str(ff['name']).replace(" ","")
text = ''.join([i for i in text if not i.isdigit()])
wordcloud = WordCloud().generate(text)


wordcloud = WordCloud(max_font_size=50, max_words=100, background_color="white").generate(text)
plt.figure()
plt.imshow(wordcloud, interpolation="bilinear")
plt.axis("off")
plt.show()

source.813ef06b:
# My Considerations for finding Best Course🤓
- 1.For the course to be good it should have a Reasonable Price
    - Lower the Better
- 2.Higher the ratings better the course
- 3.Duration should close to or equal average duration
    - Its should'nt be as low as 32mins or as high as 92 hours
    -  Lower duration courses dont cover entire syllabus or concepts 🤷‍♂️
    -  As well as High duration courses make the learners get bored easily🥱 especially the beginners
